title: Chitosan quaternary ammonium salt-oxidized sodium alginate-glycerol-calcium ion biobased self-healing hydrogels with excellent spontaneous repair performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31954-31965
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05382F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Le Zhong, Keli Peng, Yunqian Sun, Jinxian Zhou, Naiyu Xiao, Honglei Wang, Xueqin Zhang, Zheng Cheng
A chitosan quaternary ammonium salt-oxidized sodium alginate-glycerol-calcium ion biobased self-healing hydrogel was successfully designed, exhibiting excellent spontaneous repair ability, adhesion ability, mechanical properties, and resilience.
